languages.text: "У лжи есть много лиц, истина же — всегда одна. И мне она открыта. Я знал, что враг истины рано или поздно явится сюда!"
"Lies have many faces, but there is only one truth. And it has been laid bare before me. I knew the enemy of the truth would come here sooner or later!"
languages.original_text: "У лжи есть много лиц, истина же — всегда одна. И мне она открыта. Я знал, что враг истины рано или поздно явится сюда!"

traits.locale_text: "Lies have many faces, but there is only one truth. And it has been laid bare before me. I knew the enemy of the truth would come here sooner or later!"
"Lies have many faces, but there is only one truth. And it has been laid bare before me. I knew the enemy of the truth would come here sooner or later!"
"Lies have many faces, but there is only one truth. And it has been laid bare before me. I knew the enemy of the truth would come here sooner or later!"
"Lies have many faces, but there is only one truth. And it has been laid bare before me. I knew the enemy of the truth would come here sooner or later!"
"Lies have many faces, but there is only one truth. And it has been laid bare before me. I knew the enemy of the truth would come here sooner or later!"

languages.text: “谎言有许多面孔，但真理只有一个，而它已经在我面前表露无疑。我早就知道，真理的敌人迟早会找上门来！”
languages.original_text: "Lies have many faces, but there is only one truth. And it has been laid bare before me. I knew the enemy of the truth would come here sooner or later!"

traits.locale_text: “谎言有许多面孔，但真理只有一个，而它已经在我面前表露无疑。我早就知道，真理的敌人迟早会找上门来！”

languages.text: 「嘘にはいろいろな顔があるが、真実はひとつしかない。そしてそれは、私の目の前でむき出しにされた。真実の敵は、遅かれ早かれここに来るとわかっていたのだよ！」
languages.original_text: "Lies have many faces, but there is only one truth. And it has been laid bare before me. I knew the enemy of the truth would come here sooner or later!"

traits.locale_text: 「嘘にはいろいろな顔があるが、真実はひとつしかない。そしてそれは、私の目の前でむき出しにされた。真実の敵は、遅かれ早かれここに来ると思っていたのだよ！」
「嘘にはいろいろな顔があるが、真実はひとつしかない。そしてそれは、私の目の前でむき出しにされた。真実の敵は、遅かれ早かれここに来るとわかっていたのだよ！」

languages.text: "Lügen haben viele Gesichter, aber es gibt nur eine Wahrheit. Und diese wurde mir offengelegt. Ich wusste, dass {mf|der Feind|die Feindin} der Wahrheit früher oder später hierher kommt!"
languages.original_text: "Lies have many faces, but there is only one truth. And it has been laid bare before me. I knew the enemy of the truth would come here sooner or later!"

traits.locale_text: "Lügen haben viele Gesichter, aber es gibt nur eine Wahrheit. Und diese wurde mir offengelegt. Ich wusste, dass {mf|der Feind|die Feindin} der Wahrheit früher oder später hierher kommt!"

languages.text: « Les mensonges revêtent bien des visages, mais il n'existe qu'une seule vérité. Et elle a été mise à nue devant moi. Je savais que l'{mf|ennemi|ennemie} de la vérité viendrait ici tôt ou tard ! »
languages.original_text: "Lies have many faces, but there is only one truth. And it has been laid bare before me. I knew the enemy of the truth would come here sooner or later!"

traits.locale_text: « Les mensonges revêtent bien des visages, mais il n'existe qu'une seule vérité. Et elle a été mise à nue devant moi. Je savais que l'{mf|ennemi|ennemie} de la vérité viendrait ici tôt ou tard ! »

languages.text: «Las mentiras tienen muchos rostros, pero solo hay una verdad. Y me la han revelado en toda su pureza. ¡Sabía que {mf|el enemigo|la enemiga} de la verdad llegaría tarde o temprano!».
languages.original_text: "Lies have many faces, but there is only one truth. And it has been laid bare before me. I knew the enemy of the truth would come here sooner or later!"

traits.locale_text: «Las mentiras tienen muchos rostros, pero solo hay una verdad. Y me la han revelado en toda su pureza. ¡Sabía que {mf|el enemigo|la enemiga} de la verdad llegaría tarde o temprano!».

languages.text: "Yalanın yüzü çok olur ama hakikat tektir. İşte o hakikat, tüm çıplaklığıyla gözlerimin önüne serildi. Hakikatin düşmanının er geç buraya geleceğini biliyordum!"
languages.original_text: "Lies have many faces, but there is only one truth. And it has been laid bare before me. I knew the enemy of the truth would come here sooner or later!"

traits.locale_text: "Yalanın yüzü çok olur ama hakikat tektir. İşte o hakikat, tüm çıplaklığıyla gözlerimin önüne serildi. Hakikatın düşmanının er geç buraya geleceğini biliyordum!"
